archimate:Capability.name: Artificial intelligence services
archimate:Capability.documentation:
Artificial Intelligence Services is a digital capability to perform tasks typically required of an intelligent being such as human being. The tasks may involve visual perception, speech recognition, pattern recognition, decision-making and translation between languages.
Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence (AI). as AI has a larger scope that may include unconscious perception and decision-making based on for example gut feeling. Machine learning is however believed to be the most feasible way of implementing AI services now.
